Package ie.mtu.application.student.model

Class DBConnection

java.lang.Object
ie.mtu.application.student.model.DBConnection
public class DBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
Class that will take care of the database connection This class will create, delete, update, insert the Student and Module table

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DBConnection()
    This constructor will connect to the database and create the Student and Module table if they don't already exist

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void createModuleTable()
    The method will create the MODULE table in the database
    void createStudentTable()
    The method will create the STUDENT table in the database
    static void deleteModule​(Module module)
    The method will delete a specific module from the database from a specific student
    static void deleteStudent​(Student student)
    It will delete a student in the database and all his modules
    void deleteTable​(java.lang.String tableName)
    The method will delete a table
    static java.util.List<Module> getHonourModule​(int studentID)
    The function will run a SELECT query to get all the modules in the database from a specific student where he got a grade >= 70%
    static java.util.List<Module> getModule​(int studentID)
    The function will run a SELECT query to get all the modules in the database from a specific student
    static java.util.List<Student> getStudent()
    The function will run a SELECT query to get all the students in the database
    static void insertModule​(Module module)
    It will add a Module object in the MODULE table in the database
    static void insertStudent​(Student student)
    The method will insert a Student object in the STUDENT table
    static boolean isDuplicatedModuleName​(java.lang.String moduleName, int studentID)
    It checks if from the given parameters, in the MODULE table if module name from a specific student is already existing
    static boolean isStudentExist​(int studentID)
    The method will check if from the given parameter the Student in the table STUDENT is already existing
    static void updateStudent​(Student student, int oldId)
    The method will update an existing Student in the STUDENT table

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • DBConnection

      public DBConnection()
      This constructor will connect to the database and create the Student and Module table if they don't already exist

  • Method Details

    • deleteTable

      public void deleteTable​(java.lang.String tableName)
      The method will delete a table
      Parameters:
      tableName - : the name of the table we want to delete

    • createStudentTable

      public void createStudentTable()
      The method will create the STUDENT table in the database

    • createModuleTable

      public void createModuleTable()
      The method will create the MODULE table in the database

    • isStudentExist

      public static boolean isStudentExist​(int studentID)
      The method will check if from the given parameter the Student in the table STUDENT is already existing
      Parameters:
      studentID - : the student ID we want to check
      Returns:
      boolean value : true if the student exists, false if he doesn't exist

    • isDuplicatedModuleName

      public static boolean isDuplicatedModuleName​(java.lang.String moduleName, int studentID)
      It checks if from the given parameters, in the MODULE table if module name from a specific student is already existing
      Parameters:
      moduleName - : the name of the module
      studentID - : the student ID that we want to check the duplicated module name
      Returns:
      boolean value : true if found a duplicated module name, false if no duplicated module name

    • insertStudent

      public static void insertStudent​(Student student)
      The method will insert a Student object in the STUDENT table
      Parameters:
      student - : a Student object

    • insertModule

      public static void insertModule​(Module module)
      It will add a Module object in the MODULE table in the database
      Parameters:
      module - : the Module object we want to add in the database

    • deleteStudent

      public static void deleteStudent​(Student student)
      It will delete a student in the database and all his modules
      Parameters:
      student - : the student object we want to delete

    • deleteModule

      public static void deleteModule​(Module module)
      The method will delete a specific module from the database from a specific student
      Parameters:
      module - : the module Object that we want to delete

    • updateStudent

      public static void updateStudent​(Student student, int oldId)
      The method will update an existing Student in the STUDENT table
      Parameters:
      student - : the student with his new information
      oldId - : his old ID integer (if we changed it, we will need his old id to update the student)

    • getStudent

      public static java.util.List<Student> getStudent()
      The function will run a SELECT query to get all the students in the database
      Returns:
      a List of type Student from all the students in the database

    • getModule

      public static java.util.List<Module> getModule​(int studentID)
      The function will run a SELECT query to get all the modules in the database from a specific student
      Parameters:
      studentID - : the student ID that we want to get all of his modules
      Returns:
      a List of type Module from all the modules in the database from a student

    • getHonourModule

      public static java.util.List<Module> getHonourModule​(int studentID)
      The function will run a SELECT query to get all the modules in the database from a specific student where he got a grade >= 70%
      Parameters:
      studentID - : the student ID that we want to get all of his modules >= 70
      Returns:
      a List if Module
